metadata.Title: CVE-2021-0936 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - negligible
metadata.Description: In acc_read of f_accessory.c, there is a possible memory corruption due toa use after free. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with noadditional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed forexploitation.Product: AndroidVersions: Android kernelAndroid ID:A-173789633References: Upstream kernel

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-lts-xenial: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
